mapper.select: select rno, seq_tbl_report, report_cate, report_content, report_user, report_date1, report_status from view_report_main where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno} order by rno

select rno, seq_tbl_report, report_cate, report_content, report_user, report_date1, report_status from view_report_main where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno} and ${searchType} like '%'||#{searchInput}||'%' order by rno

select re_seq, seq_tbl_board, re_id, re_content, to_char(re_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as re_date, re_status, re_fk_seq, re_groupno, re_depthno from tbl_re where seq_tbl_board = #{reportnum} start with re_fk_seq = 0 connect by prior re_seq = re_fk_seq order siblings by re_groupno desc, re_seq asc
mapper.update: update tbl_board set board_status = 2 where seq_tbl_board = #{seq}
update tbl_re set re_status = 0 where seq_tbl_board = #{seq}
update tbl_board set board_status = 1 where seq_tbl_board = #{seq}
update tbl_re set re_status = 1 where seq_tbl_board = #{seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from view_report_main where ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'

select rno, seq_tbl_ask, ask_cate, ask_title, fk_login_id, ask_date1, ask_status, ask_secret, ask_groupno, ask_fk_seq, ask_depthno, ask_newest from view_help_main where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno} and ask_status = 1 and ${searchType} like '%'||#{searchInput}||'%' start with ask_fk_seq = 0 connect by prior seq_tbl_ask = ask_fk_seq order siblings by ask_groupno desc, seq_tbl_ask asc

select rno, seq_tbl_ask, ask_cate, ask_title, fk_login_id, ask_date1, ask_status, ask_secret, ask_groupno, ask_fk_seq, ask_depthno, ask_newest from view_help_main where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno} and ask_status = 1 start with ask_fk_seq = 0 connect by prior seq_tbl_ask = ask_fk_seq order siblings by ask_groupno desc, seq_tbl_ask asc
select count(*) from view_help_main where ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'

insert.if: insert into tbl_ask(seq_tbl_ask, fk_login_id, ask_cate, ask_title, ask_content, ask_date1, ask_status, ask_secret, ask_groupno) values(seq_tbl_ask.nextval, #{fk_login_id}, #{ask_cate}, #{ask_title}, #{ask_content}, default, default, #{ask_secret}, #{groupno})

insert into tbl_ask(seq_tbl_ask, fk_login_id, ask_cate, ask_title, ask_content, ask_date1, ask_status, ask_secret, ask_groupno, ask_fk_seq, ask_depthno) values(seq_tbl_ask.nextval, #{fk_login_id}, #{ask_cate}, #{ask_title}, #{ask_content}, default, default, #{ask_secret}, #{groupno}, #{fk_seq}, #{depthno}+1)

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_aimage (aimg_category, aimg_seq, aimg_filename, aimg_orgfilename, aimg_filesize, aimg_status, aimg_thumb) values(${aimg_category}, #{seq}, #{newFileName}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize}, 1, #{thumbnailFileName})
mapper.update: update tbl_ask set ask_status = 0 where seq_tbl_ask = #{seq}
update tbl_ask set ask_cate = #{ask_cate}, ask_title = #{ask_title}, ask_content = #{ask_content}, ask_secret = #{ask_secret} where seq_tbl_ask = #{seq}

update tbl_aimage set aimg_filename = #{newFileName}, aimg_orgfilename = #{originalFilename}, aimg_filesize = #{fileSize}, aimg_status = 1, aimg_thumb = #{thumbnailFileName} where aimg_category = 1 and aimg_seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_aimage where aimg_category = 1 and aimg_seq = #{seq}
